description: Application for a Non-Material amendment to Planning Permission ref: 20/01103/FUL (Sub-division of plot following demolition of garage and construction of 2 x semi-detached houses (1 x three-bedroom and 1 x four-bedroom) and associated amenity space, parking and refuse facilities; addition of garage door to front elevation of existing house and replacement of flank window with side door). Amendment to include addition of 10 solar panels to rear slope of roof, addition of 1 roof window to the flank roof slope of each dwelling, addition of en-suite bathroom (internal amendment) and repositioning of 1st floor rear windows
